sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './Home.css' const Home = () => { useEffect(() => { const handleMouseMove = (e) => { const trail = document.createElement('div') trail.className = 'trail' trail.style.left = `${e.pageX}px` trail.style.top = `${e.pageY}px` trail.style.backgroundColor = `#${Math.floor(Math.random() * 16777215).toString(16)}` document.body.appendChild(trail) setTimeout(() => { trail.remove() }, 500) } document.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove) return () => { document.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove) } }, []) return (

Welcome to My Portfolio

I'm a passionate developer creating awesome web experiences.

About Me

Hi, I'm Harsh Anand, a web developer with a knack for building beautiful and functional websites. I specialize in React, JavaScript, and CSS, and I’m always eager to learn new technologies to stay ahead in the ever-evolving world of web development.

I have a strong focus on creating intuitive user interfaces and ensuring seamless user experiences. Whether it's developing dynamic single-page applications or crafting responsive designs, I take pride in delivering high-quality work.

When I’m not coding, you’ll often find me exploring new frameworks, contributing to open-source projects, or brainstorming innovative ideas for web solutions. Feel free to browse my portfolio to see some of the projects I've worked on!

) } export default Home
